A mụrụ Nana Ama Browne Klutse na ka ọnwa Mee dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na atọ n'afọ 1981 na Nyanfeku Ekroful
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Anomabo Methodist Primary nakwa JHS.
Ọ gara n'ihu n' ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Mfantsiman Girls ma mecha gaa Mahadum Cape Coast na Ghana ị gụ ma nweta nzere BSc na Physics
Ọ gara n'ihu ma nweta nzere Ph.D
ya na Climatology na Mahadum Cape Town na South Africa.
Dr Klutse na-amụ banyere ọnọdụ ihu igwe nke West Africa

Ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya n'ihe gbasara sayensị ihu igwe tụmadị mmiri ozuzo nke Afrịka. Ọ bụ onye nkuzi dị elu na Ngalaba Physics, na Mahadum Ghana. N'oge gara aga, ọ na-elekọta ngalaba a kpọrọ Remote Sensing and Climate Centre. Klutse bụ onye na-ahụ maka sayensị ihu igwe nke African Institute for Mathematical Sciences nakwa onye isi odee naenyere aka edepụta nke akpọrọ IPCC Sixth Assessment Report (AR6)
Ọ na-agbakwa ụmụaka ndị nwaanyị nọ na Ghana ume ka ha tụlee ọrụ sayensị ma na-akwado mmelite na agụmakwụkwọ sayensị na mba ahụ.
Klutse rụrụ ọrụ nụlọ ọrụ a kpọrọ Ghana Space Science and Technology Institute nke Ghana Atomic Energy Commission dị ka onye isi nchọpụta sayensị site n'afọ 2016 ruo 2018
Tupu nke a, ọ bụ onye nkuzi ọbịa na West African Science Service Centre on Climate and Adapted Land Use (WASCAL) na Akure, Nigeria.
Klutse na-arụkwa ọrụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka onye otu National Democratic Congress.
